Container.Name: DDNSnix
Container.Description: UnofficialDDNSnix is a CentOS 6, Debian 6, and Debian 7 service which provides dynamic DNS for regular registrars. Instead of signing up with a dynamic DNS provider and creating a CNAME record at your registrar to point to your dynamic DNS (for example: homeserver.mydomain.com -> alfred1986.dynamicdnsprovider.info), UnofficialDDNS cuts out the middle man and creates A records directly.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Where the config file will be created.[br] [b]/var/UnofficialDDNS/[/b] : Where the log files will be output.[br]
